## BubbleDragger.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BubbleDragger` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(bubble: IBubble, workspace: WorkspaceSvg);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bubble | [IBubble](./blockly.ibubble.md) | The item on the bubble canvas to drag. |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace to drag on. |
